name: SGModel
description: A fast lightweight library for structuring web applications using binding models and custom events
author: Kalashnikov Ilya <ilyak@sg2d.ru> (http://model.sg2d.ru/)

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.config.sg-model.js --mode=production & webpack --config webpack.config.sg-model.js --mode=production --env MINIMIZE=true & webpack --config webpack.config.sg-model-view.js --mode=production & webpack --config webpack.config.sg-model-view.js --mode=production --env MINIMIZE=true
